Uses of Class
jama2.Matrix

  • Packages that use Matrix 
    Package Description
    jama2
    This package contains the Matrix class and all other related classes.
    jama2.examples
    This package contains examples for using the Matrix class.

      CholeskyDecomposition(Matrix Arg)
      Cholesky algorithm for symmetric and positive definite matrix.

      Check for symmetry, then construct the eigenvalue decomposition Structure to access D and V.

      LU Decomposition Structure to access L, U and piv.

      QRDecomposition(Matrix A)
      QR Decomposition, computed by Householder reflections.
